SummaryEnglish: Sun Wukong's Mountain of Flowers and Fruit is assaulted by the  Group and Sun's fellow monkeys are easily taken down. The  Group eventually come to the center and try to stole Ruyi Jingu Bang but is stopped by Sun Wukong. After taking disadvantage, the Ninga brings a record which starts to play the sutra to tighten Sun's magical circlet and make him painful.
